channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Crossing not working, 24th January
item.description:
Hey, I use this crossing to get to work but it hasn't been working lately. I believe it still works from the Baker & Graze side but not from the Farrow & Ball side. Thanks, Nick
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Suffolk Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose manhole cover in road- very noisy, 24th January
item.description:
Manhole cover frequently bangs as traffic drives over- busy stretch of road so noisy for nearby residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Saint George's Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extensive graffiti in alleyway of Grovesnor st south, 24th January
item.description:
Grafitti (some tags same as grafitti in Pittville park)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Regent Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Shopping trolley dumped on grounds next to bridge over the brook. It is an Asda trolley., 24th January
item.description:
The shopping trolley was found in the brook and has been placed on the roadside.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: V deep pothole, 24th January
item.description:
Very deep pothole here. A second pothole in Pilley Crescent has been circled in white; whoever did this must have driven right over this pothole. Did it not occur to them this could do with being reported & circled too?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Pilley Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep potholes, 24th January
item.description:
Several v deep potholes here. A car nearly hit me this morning as it swerved to avoid one. Urgently need repairing please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tagging on sign, 24th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 110 Evesham Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Maintenance of pillar box, 24th January
item.description:
The pillar box is in poor condition, having apparently not been properly painted, including adequate preparation, for years. Please arrange for this to be rectified.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 66 Church Road, Leckhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Little down Shakespeare Road from the junction of Goldsmith to PE way, 23rd January

item.description:

item.title: 2 deep potholes in Church Road, 22nd January
item.description:
One of the holes was photographed/reported on 5 January. Inevitably in the meantime they have both grown. Cars seen driving into the wrong side of the road to avoid holes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Boleyn Cottages Church Road, Swindon Village
